Name: NEVERLAND
About the game: NEVERLAND is a co-op, survival horror and open world game. Join With Your Friends Or Survive Alone . Explore with up to 4 friends or adventure alone, uncover the horrific past and mysteries of a forgotten island, keep yourself sane, don't get captured alive and... stay quiet. You are on your own Collect and craft items that'll help you survive. Don't waste your resources, but don't hesitate to use them either.

Meta Description: Looking for information on NEVERLAND? Check out the release date (Sep 15, 2022), developer insights from Víctor Núñez, and a complete game summary.
